tracks.text: DJ Matsunaga approaches a turntable. He spins the right of 2 discs. He has short blond hair and wears a baggy jacket.
Rapper R-Shitei dances. Clones of R-Shitei and Matsunaga fill our view. Their clones gather in the shape of letters spelling Otonoke
Large faces of Matsunaga and R-Shitei spin in a circle. At the center, R-Shitei raps while walking in a circle. A cow floats above him.
The word otonoke is written on his teeth in Japanese
The duo walk along the spinning vinyl
Matsunaga DJ's behind piles of televisions and electronics from the mid-1900's
The equipment spins on a stack of discs, 5 tiers high
R-Shitei raps from a tier below the TV's. A flying saucer floats above him.
R-Shitei opens his mouth, revealing a clone of himself. We enter his mouth, and his clone opens his mouth. Repeat.
Hundreds of R-Shitei's sing or make faces.
Matsunaga operates a giant turntable. He spins around, and his face has grown larger. The discs are the size of his eyes.
R-Shitei dances. His hands grow to the size of his body.
